an4.41:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata ditthadhammasukhaviharaya samvattati;
an4.41:1.4: atthi, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata nanadassanappatilabhaya samvattati;
an4.41:1.5: atthi, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata satisampajannaya samvattati;
an4.41:1.6: atthi, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata asavanam khayaya samvattati.
an4.41:2.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata ditthadhammasukhaviharaya samvattati?
an4.41:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.41:2.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata ditthadhammasukhaviharaya samvattati.
an4.41:3.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata nanadassanappatilabhaya samvattati?
an4.41:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu alokasannam manasi karoti, divasannam adhitthati—
an4.41:3.3: yatha diva tatha rattim, yatha rattim tatha diva.
an4.41:3.4: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
an4.41:3.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata nanadassanappatilabhaya samvattati.
an4.41:4.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata satisampajannaya samvattati?
an4.41:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vidita vedana uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti;
an4.41:4.3: vidita sanna …pe… vidita vitakka uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
an4.41:4.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata satisampajannaya samvattati.
an4.41:5.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata asavanam khayaya samvattati?
an4.41:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassi viharati:
an4.41:5.3: ‘iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
an4.41:5.4: iti vedana, iti vedanaya samudayo, iti vedanaya atthangamo;
an4.41:5.5: iti sanna, iti sannaya samudayo, iti sannaya atthangamo;
an4.41:5.6: iti sankhara, iti sankharanam samudayo, iti sankharanam atthangamo;
an4.41:5.7: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti.
an4.41:5.8: Ayam, bhikkhave, samadhibhavana bhavita bahulikata asavanam khayaya samvattati.
an4.41:5.10: Idanca pana metam, bhikkhave, sandhaya bhasitam parayane punnakapanhe:
